job_description:
LogiSense is seeking a Senior Test Automation Developer to join our team. You’ll work on fascinating technology, while enjoying a work-from-home virtual environment with an outstanding group of people who are solving new challenges around monetizing IoT, Communications and XaaS products and services for Enterprise customers.

As a key member of our engineering team, you’ll help us test, refine, and improve our industry-leading usage-based billing platform that offers companies a new way to do business.

LogiSense believes that people should pay for what they use, that billing should be clear and accurate, and that companies should treat customers with foresight and respect. The technology needed to do that—to measure, rate, and bill for every instance, event, or action—is complex and always changing. Together, we’re building the future of business.

Our billing technology can rate and monetize any product or service in the Internet of Things (IoT), Communications, and XaaS industries.

LogiSense values work-life balance, seeks people of high integrity and talent and offers excellent benefits and pay along with company funded opportunities for personal development, training and certification - not to mention company hackathons, social events and other company-sponsored activities to enable team innovation and individual professional development.

The Position

As a LogiSense Senior Test Automation Developer, you’ll do more than build and test code—you’ll become an expert in understanding what our clients need our software to do and in creatively executing plans to get there. You will contribute directly to the growing capabilities of our industry leading billing platform. At LogiSense, our core values are: Be good. Seek balance. Get paid. Every decision we make aligns with these principles. In this role, you will…

Be good at:
Applying your experience: Minimum Seven (7) years of web or other relevant software testing experience; Five (5) years developing automated tests; Three (3) years with Python; and a post-secondary education in computer science, software engineering, or equivalent professional experience
Design, develop, and maintain robust and scalable test automation frameworks that support various testing needs, including UI, API, and performance testing
Demonstrated proficiency in analytical skills, enabling seamless integration, processing, and correlation of information from various logs to precisely identify and pinpoint the root causes of issues
Automating API based tests using Python
Automating UI based tests using Selenium.
Writing complex SQL queries.
Configuring/monitoring jobs/tasks using the Continuous Integration/Delivery pipeline
Devising new and creative testing strategies for complex software, and then planning and executing those strategies
Staying up-to-date with current test automation techniques, technologies, and toolsets
Ensuring the quality of source code via source code reviews
Ensuring that the codebase is scalable and maintainable
Sharpening your team’s skills by providing regular input and feedback
Breaking down high-level testing requirements into component tasks and work items
Communicating with your team, with other internal teams, and with clients when applicable
Collaborating inside your team and across other functions
Bonus points for familiarity with:
Behave, and Gherkin Test Design
Performance benchmarking for API-based product
RabbitMQ
AWS (Amazon Web Service)
Agile development
Scrum and/or Kanban

Seek Balance Through:

The option to work how you choose: LogiSense is committed to letting our staff work fully remote, in office, or using a hybrid model of their choosing
A healthy work-life balance, enjoying paid time off and holidays, and also taking advantage of time and funding provided by LogiSense to develop your skills and education
An enthusiasm to work both individually and collaboratively in a team environment
Growth through challenging day to day work and company funds for professional development and education

Get Paid:

A highly competitive salary, comparable to or above industry standard
Through perks of life at LogiSense that include autonomy and virtual work flexibility, comprehensive benefits (optical, dental, pharmaceutical and others), paid vacation, and company holiday shutdown in addition to numerous other events, perks, swag and other accoutrements of the LogiSense culture
Via stock options and equity on a discretionary basis for long-term high performers dedicated to the success of the company

You do more than check boxes:

We’re not just looking for a list of qualifications — we’re looking for the right person for the job. We take pride in creating a great culture with autonomy, flexibility and world-class pay and benefits. In return, we are seeking intelligent, curious and driven individuals who see things the way we do.

We’re looking for an automation developer who wants to solve big programming challenges, grow their career, and take an active role in improving our product and our company.

Your ideas matter. Your work matters. You matter. Come join our team!

LogiSense is an equal opportunity employer and we are proud to provide any necessary accommodation during the recruitment and employment process. Should you require any accommodation, please indicate this when you apply and we will work with you to meet your accessibility needs.
